title: Stout and Strong (4U57)
text:
Set:	The Two Towers
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Dwarven
Twilight:	0
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	Plays to your support area. Each time a Dwarf wins a skirmish, you may place a [Dwarven] token on this card. Skirmish: Make an unbound companion strength +1 for each [Dwarven] token here (limit +3). Discard this condition.
Lore:	”'Never did I see an axe so wielded.'”
Rarity:	U
